name: Chekrut Fire Storm
text: All FIRE monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF. Once per turn: You can target 1 of your banished FIRE monsters; return it the hand, and if you do, lose LP equal to its original Level x 100. If this card in the Field Zone is destroyed by a card effect: You can add 1 "Chekrut" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Chekrut Fire Storm".
